short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add code share abilities to browser messangers like WhatsApp Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add code snippets to your WhatsApp messages.

Use Markdown code blocks or a link to your code on https://codequest.frank-mayer.io in your message and this extension will render the code block for you.

Keep in mind that the syntax highlighting will not work if your chat partner is not using this (or a similar) extension.

For the source code or more information visit the GitHub page of this project: https://github.com/Frank-Mayer/codequest.ext
